ai-tha-ap516:0.3_0: The Elder Nuns, having given a flower
ai-tha-ap516:1.4_0: meditate on the ugly aspects of the body:
ai-tha-ap516:2.1_0: The smell of flowers goes on the sweet,
ai-tha-ap516:2.2_0: I am the one who understands
ai-tha-ap516:3.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap516:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap516:5.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap516:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Universal Monarch.
